column2: so it was hard to decide what to order. I had the Bi Bim Bop Bowl
column3: which was pretty good...pickled vegetables with cauliflower rice topped with sunny side up eggs. My husband was being picky
column4: so he asked for a cheddar and tomato omelette (not on the menu
column5: but they made it for him). We stopped at the bakery afterwards for a chocolate chunk cookie that was absolutely delicious! Will go back to try something from the lunch menu.
